The video footage recorded by Donald Tru: inside the private tent at Ellipse Park near the White House on Jan. 6, 2021, showing Trump and members of his inner circle dancing, smiling, and watching television screens.
The absence of footage on the screens in: instead depicting a crowd gathering in front of a stage where Trump would later speak.
The context of the video: which surfaced online shortly after the Jan. 6, 2021, insurrection, and was presented as alleged evidence that President Trump watched the siege from the private tent party.
Additional details from the video: such as Trump Jr. briefly stopping the camera on his girlfriend Kimberly Guilfoyle, and the presence of White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows, providing further authenticity to the claim.
